title: Grand Millennium Dubai hosts top concierges
text:
Grand Millennium Dubai hosts top concierges   
Aug 12, 2015 Banners   
DUBAI, United Arab Emirates - Grand Millennium Dubai hosted monthly meeting of Les Clefs d’Or UAE, regional chapter of the Union Internationale Des Concierges d’Hotels (UICH), on August 10, 2015, where group members discussed hottest hospitality issues and updated concierges on the latest trends in the industry. 
On this occasion, the hotel also celebrated the exceptional achievement of its Chief Concierge Mr. Babasab Birajdar, who recently obtained membership of the Les Clefs d’Or UAE (the Society of Golden Key). The elite club of concierge managers boasts only 37 qualified members. 
Mr. Peter Mansourian, General Manager of Grand Millennium Dubai said, “We were delighted to host the group for the second time at our hotel. This was an opportunity for our concierges to reacquaint with colleagues from various other hotels and strengthen the spirit of the group. The meeting also updated the concierges with growing demands of the guests and suggested ways to meet those expectations.” 
Obtaining membership of the Les Clefs d’Or UAE also brings responsibilities in promoting tourism and enhancing the group’s commitment to increase its member’s network with other concierges. Les Clefs d’Or Concierges have their fingers on the pulses of their cities, able to advise guests on restaurants, night life, sporting and theater events, sightseeing tours, shopping, etc. They can direct guests to any location, to any product, at any time of day or night.
